article_title: Netanyahu adviser says Israel making 'maximum effort' to avoid civilian casualties.
sentence: Mark  Regev,  one  of  Israeli  Prime  Minister  Benjamin  Netanyahuâ€™s  senior  advisers,  tells  the  BBC  Israel  is  making  "maximum  effort"  to  avoid  civilian  casualties,  following  warnings  from  US  allies  over  the  number  of  Palestinians  being  killed.

article_title: Netanyahu adviser says Israel making 'maximum effort' to avoid civilian casualties.
sentence: More  than  6,000  children  are  among  the  15,000  people  who  have  been  killed  during  Israel's  bombardment  of  the  Gaza  Strip,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
